title: Senior Full-Stack Web Developer - Data Governance and API Integration
summary: At Apple, our Data Analytics team is at the forefront of extracting insights from a vast array of device diagnostics and telemetry data from around the globe...
description: As an integral part of our software engineering team focused on Data Governance solutions, your mission will involve the creation of intuitive UIs, robust APIs, and comprehensive reporting tools. These elements are crucial for enabling stakeholders to manage, query, and monitor data governance metadata effectively. Your contributions will be pivotal in upholding Apple's standards of Privacy, Compliance, and Security.
key_qualifications: Profound expertise in full-stack web development, with 5 years' experience crafting web applications using TypeScript or JavaScript, complemented by contemporary libraries and frameworks.
education_experience: Bachelors in Computer Science or equivalent experience.
additional_requirements: Experience developing data governance software or integrating systems with a data governance system
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $166,600 and $296,300, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs...
